item.title: Starting today, the Apple iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus are now available in China
item.description:
Apple’s iPhone 6 and iPhone 6 Plus will be offered in China starting October 17th through various channels like Apple’s website, physical stores, major carriers, and authorized retailers. These smartphones will also be available in 36 more countries and territories by the end of October, reaching a total of over 115 countries by the year’s end. Source: Apple. The iPhone 6 and the iPhone 6 Plus. Both iPhone models support TD-LTE and FDD-LTE, allowing customers to use 4G/LTE networks from China Mobile, China Telecom, and China Unicom throughout mainland China...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/starting-today-the-apple-iphone-6-and-iphone-6-plus-are-now-available-in-china/

item.title: Accor Plus is the latest paid loyalty program offered by Accor
item.description:
Source: Accor. Accor Advantage Plus, the paid loyalty program from Accor with more than 350,000 members in 17 countries, has been renamed and enhanced. Now known as Accor Plus, this 21-year-old program allows members to enjoy enhanced experiences at over 600 Accor properties in the Asia Pacific region. The company stated that members can benefit from substantial discounts on accommodations, dining at over 800 restaurants, and access to various VIP events and partner offers...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/accor-plus-is-the-latest-paid-loyalty-program-offered-by-accor/

item.title: Singtel hosts launch event for iPhone 6s and 6s Plus
item.description:
Singtel began offering the iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus to customers this morning. Eager customers with confirmed appointments started lining up as early as 4:45 am, hoping to be among the first in Singapore to get their hands on the new devices. Over 40,000 customers expressed interest in the new iPhones, and all 12,000 launch appointment slots were booked. The iPhone 6s Plus and the rose gold models were particularly popular, selling out in less than three minutes...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/singtel-hosts-launch-event-for-iphone-6s-and-6s-plus/

item.title: BLUEPOPS, a fashion brand specializing in plus-sized clothing, is now expanding its presence on a global scale
item.description:
Source: BLUEPOPS website. BLUEPOPS, a Korean online retailer specializing in plus-size women’s apparel (sizes M to XXL), is taking a hands-on approach by creating its clothing lines. According to owner Jo Yeong-hwa, focusing on elegance is crucial. She believes that to keep customers happy, the website needs to consistently introduce new products with a distinct brand identity. BLUEPOPS conducts customer surveys biannually. Through a recent survey, they discovered that customers rely heavily on product details when making purchasing decisions...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/bluepops-a-fashion-brand-specializing-in-plus-sized-clothing-is-now-expanding-its-presence-on-a-global-scale/

item.title: Starting from 26 September, StarHub is excited to welcome buyers of the iPhone 6s and 6s Plus
item.description:
Source: StarHub. Customers waiting in line inside the newly renovated StarHub Shop in VivoCity, one of 38 StarHub stores serving pre-order customers on September 25th. On September 25th, pre-orders for Apple’s iPhone 6s and iPhone 6s Plus became available for pickup at 38 StarHub stores across Singapore. To ensure a smooth pickup process, customers who pre-ordered were given specific locations and time slots when they booked their appointments. Starting September 26th, customers can visit any StarHub Shop or participating authorized retailers to purchase the phones directly...
Read The Full Article :https://Nexus-Security.github.io/starting-from-26-september-starhub-is-excited-to-welcome-buyers-of-the-iphone-6s-and-6s-plus/
